======================= MFam Autoclassification =======================
----------- Description -----------
| Apply the MFam Classifier to on all the spectra found in a MSP file. The MFam Classifier is applied per sample and then joined afterwards.
----------- Input files -----------
+---------------------------------------------+------------+ | File | Format | +=============================================+============+ | 1) MSP file | MSP | | 2) Compound classes reference text file | TXT | +---------------------------------------------+------------+
---------- Parameters ----------
Polarity | The polarity used for the mode of acquisition. |
------------ Output files ------------
+----------------------------------------------------------+--------+ | Files | Format | +==========================================================+========+ | 1) Plot containing the abundance of compound classes | PDF | | 2) MFam autoclassification summary | TXT | | 3) MFam classifier validation table | TSV | | 4) MFam classes richness table | TSV | | 5) MFam classifier R-Data | RData | +----------------------------------------------------------+--------+
